body: Hi, so I played the server a couple years back and it had a ton of players. I quit for a couple years for other things and I come back now avicus doesn't have much players anymore or something. A lot of games I see don't even have players in them and the most popular seems to be my favorite Nebula. What happened to all the players? ._.

title: What happened to all the players?

replies.body: A lot of things changed. It's been a bumpy road and a lot of the veterans left.
replies.body_tagged: A lot of things changed. It's been a bumpy road and a lot of the veterans left.

replies.body: They quit once they found out that TheCrazyBeaners lost the last match of the league and we got 2nd place :(
replies.body_tagged: They quit once they found out that TheCrazyBeaners lost the last match of the league and we got 2nd place :(

replies.body: Advertising stopped/slowed, things became a mess

replies.body: I personally am still around. Idk why, I don't play Avicus much but here I am.
replies.body_tagged: I personally am still around. Idk why, I don't play Avicus much but here I am.

replies.body:
We aren't  keeping new players, I joined right before it went way downhill, (before avicore update).  But new players join and get no choices of game modes, because only nebula plays, walls occasionally happens and cth happens every now and then.  No nexus, no arcade (which isn't even up currently), no sg.  And as less players came back, the more these game modes died out.  

People get older and leave, that happens, we can't withhold the same people forever.  But we are not getting new people in their place due to bad first impression.  So that's why the numbers dropped
replies.body_tagged:

People get older and leave, that happens, we can't withhold the same people forever.  But we are not getting new people in their place due to bad first impression.  So that's why the numbers dropped
